name: “Pump the $PISS” Refrigerator Magnet
description: Pisscoin Home Collection Summer Season 2021 Catalog #01- All pump, no dump. - Add some inspiration to your space with this cute and colorful magnet featuring the Pisscoin “Pump the $PISS” Fitness Model. Buyer of this OBJKT will receive the artist’s proof of the “Pump the $PISS” acrylic magnet (5.5 x 4 in) seen here*, signed by Pisscoin Home Collection Chief Creative Officer, Pis Pistofferson. Shipping fees are included for addresses anywhere in the continental United States. After purchase, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram with shipping address. Item will ship within 5-7 days of purchase. For collectors outside the continental US and for all other inquiries about the artwork, please DM @dgpgallerie on Instagram. *Only for the first sale. Resale is subject to the Guzzler’s Oath. Any collector purchasing this OBJKT through the secondary market should contact the current owner and @dgpgallerie on Instagram to confirm the good(s) for sale.
